short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the keyboard to browse XKCD comics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use common keyboard shortcuts to navigate through XKCD comics without having to take your hands away from the keyboard!

Next Comic: space, 'j', 'n', right-arrow
Previous Comic: 'k', 'p', left-arrow

For the best experience, use this with the "XKCD Alt Text" Extension.
